question: private void update() { Graphic graphic = getComponent(Graphic.class); if (graphic != null) { Color color = graphic.getColor(); color.setA(opacity); graphic.setColor(color); } List<Graphic> children = getComponentsInChildren(Graphic.class); for (Graphic g : children) { Color c = g.getColor(); c.setA(opacity); g.setColor(c); } }
answer: private void Update() { GetComponent<Graphic>().color = GetComponent<Graphic>().color.Set(a: opacity); GetComponentsInChildren<Graphic>().ForEach(g => g.color = g.color.Set(a: opacity)); }

question: public class DataSerializer { private static final ObjectMapper converter = new ObjectMapper(); public static String serializeData(Object data, boolean formattedOutput) { if (data == null) return null; try { if (formattedOutput) { converter.enable(SerializationFeature.INDENT_OUTPUT); } else { converter.disable(SerializationFeature.INDENT_OUTPUT); } return converter.writeValueAsString(data); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); return null; } } }
answer: public static class DataSerializer { public static string SerializeData(this object data, Formatting formatting = Formatting.None) { return data != null ? JObject.FromObject(data).ToString(formatting) : default(string); } }

question: public class FilledTriangleUp implements IMarker { @Override public void draw(Graphics2D gfx, float centerX, float centerY, float size, Color fillColor) { // 获取三角形顶点 float[][] points = MarkerTools.triangleUpPoints(centerX, centerY, size); Polygon polygon = new Polygon(); for (float[] point : points) { polygon.addPoint(Math.round(point[0]), Math.round(point[1])); } gfx.setColor(fillColor); gfx.fillPolygon(polygon); } }
answer: public struct FilledTriangleUp : IMarker { public void Draw(Graphics gfx, PointF center, float size, Brush brush, Pen pen) { PointF[] points = MarkerTools.TriangleUpPoints(center, size); gfx.FillPolygon(brush, points); } }

question: public final class TextBuilderUtilities { private TextBuilderUtilities() { } public static <T> StringBuilder concatenateItems(StringBuilder textBuilder, String delimiter, Collection<T> items) { if (textBuilder == null || items == null) return textBuilder; StringJoiner joiner = new StringJoiner(delimiter); for (T item : items) { joiner.add(item.toString()); } textBuilder.append(joiner.toString()); return textBuilder; } }
answer: internal static class TextBuilderUtilities { #if NET20_BASE public static StringBuilder ConcatenateItems<T>(this StringBuilder textBuilder, string delimiter, IEnumerable<T> items) => textBuilder.Append(string.Join(delimiter, items)); #endif }
